subject: Interview Invitation for Marketing Coordinator Role at GreenTech Inc.
body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your interest in the Marketing Coordinator position at GreenTech Inc. We were impressed with your background and would like to invite you to participate in an interview.

The interview is scheduled for Thursday, March 21 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via Skype. You will be meeting with Rachel Lee, Director of Marketing, who will walk you through the role and answer any questions you may have.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability.

Best regards,
Julia Chen
Recruiting Coordinator
GreenTech Inc.
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
